tracks.title: Complete Greek, Track 40 - Language Transfer, The Thinking Method

tracks.title: Complete Greek, Track 41 - Language Transfer, The Thinking Method
tracks.description:
Track 41 of Complete Greek, and not any old track... but our 100th audio release since the beginning of the monthly crowdfunding campaign! www.patreon.com/languagetransfer

100 tracks in 4 languages since September!

Thats 100 unique tracks in 4 languages (Turkish, German, Greek and Italian) with under $3,000 from all donations over 8 months! 
A lot of invisible work goes into each track; the language is studied, experimented with, investigated and researched, course writing begins, open public workshops to test the material, more writing, fiddling and investigation, then recording, proofing, audio editing
As you might imagine, that's meant some seriously hard work for one person and one poor little brain! I value so much your support that I want to make every dollar stretch as far as it can. We can boast that the cost to the supporting user has been a real overall cost of $30 per track! That's some efficiency!

The next step is to get me working full time on the free material asap, so that I can dedicate even more energy to the project... imagine!
Join the campaign and become a supporting user, it might just be the best way to spend a dollar a month!
www.patreon.com/languagetransfer

tracks.title: Complete Greek, Track 42 - Language Transfer, The Thinking Method
tracks.description:
This is the last of the Complete Greek audios currently recorded! Now back to work on the script!
If you are in Spain, France or UK this summer and would like to be the next recording student for Complete Greek, get in touch! www.languagetransfer.org

We also still need more Greek native speaker volunteers for proofing, volunteers to transcribe audios, and contributors to the Patreon campaign to help us complete Complete Greek faster! www.patreon.com/languagetransfer

tracks.title: Complete Greek, Track 43 - Language Transfer, The Thinking Method
tracks.description: Woooohooo! We're releasing Complete Greek again! And we'll aim to release an audio a day until the whole series is complete!
